title: Say Hello to My Little Friend: Dean Myerow-My Favorite Movie, NO REMAKES PLEASE
review: I may have moved to South Florida because this movie. It highlights the glamorous yet violent life of drug dealing Cuban refugee Tony Montana. Tony, a Mariel boat lifted refugee dumped onto the shores of Miami Beach makes his way up the ladder of violence to become the kingpin drug dealer. I heard there is a re-make coming with Leonardo DiCaprio playing Tony coming out in 2018. It will never be the same as the original.....Dean Myerow
